0.10.5: [Improved] Trim empty new lines in sketchtool run output (Thanks @stwind) #63
0.10.4: [Fixed] fix publishing to registry even with -n flag
0.10.3: [Improved] More precide message when no GitHub token
[Fixed] Fix some typos when publishing a repo (Thanks @bomberstudios) #55
0.10.1: [New] allow to namespace all the skpm configuration in the `package.json` by `skpm` (Thanks @chrislloyd) #44
0.10.0: [New] allow to export multiple commands per file and to import images
[New] add webpack plugin to write stuff at the bottom of a file
[Improved] watch `manifest.json` and rebuild the plugin when changed
[Fixed] Fix copy for the github asset when publishing
0.9.16: [Fixed] Fix running the command after build on Sketch 44+
0.9.15: [New] Allow to set `appcast` to false to disable it
0.9.13: [Improved] When publishing, check if the sketchplugins/plugin-directory repo already contains the plugin. If not, open a PR to add it.
0.9.12: [Fixed] The require call to the `config` util used the wrong path (Thanks @markdalgleish)
0.9.11: [New] Warning to restart Sketch 45+ when linking
[New] Create and update appcast.xml when publishing (see http://sketchplugins.com/d/229-updating-plugins)
0.9.10: [New] save plugins to config when installing/uninstalling plugins
[New] publish and check for compatible sketch version
[Improved] add default sketch compatible version on init
0.9.7: [Fixed] Replace ES6 deconstruring by manual deconstruring to support nodejs 4
0.9.5: [Improved] Keep Sketch on the background with the -r build option
[Improved] Use COScript instead of sketchtool for the -r build option
0.9.4: [New] basic error handling on -r build option: check for `Unknown command ‘run’` and `no such file or directory` and display some helper message
[Fixed] Look for polyfills in skpm's node_modules as well as the file node_modules
0.9.3: [Fixed] Fix -r option of the build command when the output path have a space
0.9.2: [Fixed] Look for webpack loaders in skpm's node_modules as well as the file node_modules
0.9.1: [New] `log` command to show the Sketch.app logs
[Improved] fail safe when inputing a unknown command
0.9.0: [Improved] `fetch` and `console` are now polyfilled on demand
0.8.2: [Fixed] fix a bug with the new .babelrc parsing - if a skpm project doesn't have a .babelrc and a parent directory does, babel-loader tries to use the parent .babelrc file.
0.8.1: [New] option to specify which repo to use with `skpm publish`
[New] option to not bump the version with `skpm publish`
[Fixed] fix uploading the zip asset when using `skpm publish`
0.8.0: [New] add `.sketch.js,.js` resolve stack in webpack config
[New] add `--run` flag to `build` command to run the command once built
[Improved] Switch from `rollup` to `webpack` to build plugins
[Improved] Use `object-assign` instead of `Object.assign` to increase node support
[Improved] exit process when user webpack config can't be read
[Fixed] fix lint everywhere and run `standard` on travis
